title: A Deadly Slice of Lime
description: *This is book 6 in the Key West Culinary Cozy Series*Marilyn and Tiara are at it again, as murder strikes too close to the family for comfort. Tiara’s father travels to Key West for a charter fishing vacation with his buddy. While attempting to reconnect with his daughter, he finds himself in hot water when his buddy goes missing. Marilyn still feels more than a bit of hostility toward her ex, but is swayed by her daughter to help when the police interview him as a “person of interest.”Copy and paste these links into your browser to get the rest of the books in the Book 1: Book 2: Book 3: Book 4: Book 5:
author: Summer Prescott
